thread.title: Intex launches 11,000mAh power bank at Rs 1099 in India
thread.title_full: Intex launches 11,000mAh power bank at Rs 1099 in India

title: Intex launches 11,000mAh power bank at Rs 1099 in India
text:
Sep 29, 2015, 02.43 PM | Source: IBNLive.com Intex launches 11,000mAh power bank at Rs 1099 in India Tapping on the flourishing segment of the electronics market, Intex has announced its latest power bank with a powerful 11,000mAh Li-ion battery.   Intex launches 11,000mAh power bank at Rs 1099 in India Tapping on the flourishing segment of the electronics market, Intex has announced its latest power bank with a powerful 11,000mAh Li-ion battery.   
W ith smartphones getting slimmer and the battery efficiency eventually decreasing, power banks have now become one of the most crucial add-on accessories for gadgets. 
Tapping on the flourishing segment of the electronics market, Intex has announced its latest power bank with a powerful 11,000mAh Li-ion battery. 
The Intex power bank (PB11K) weighs 280gms and measures 14.2 x 6.3 x 2.6 cm. It has three USB 2.0 ports with different output (5V 1A, 5V2A & 5V 2A). 
It has small power buttons and four LED indicators to show remaining power. The power bank consists of a torch function and with a one-year warranty, it is available online at PayTM, Snapdeal, and Amazon at Rs 1099. 
Speaking at the launch, Ms Nidhi Markanday, Business Head, Consumer Durables & IT, Intex Technologies said, “At Intex, we always focus on consumer needs and try to meet their expectations by delivering the best of products at affordable prices. Keeping today’s young consumer in mind, we have launched our latest addition in Power Bank segment - PB11K exclusively through e-commerce portals. The device is a blend of latest technology with elegant looks, for the customers who want style with substance and that too within anyone’s budget.”
